dataset.title: Picoplankton 18S rRNA gene sequences (V9 region) from Vertical Profiles (surface to 4000m depth) sampled during the Malaspina 2010 circumglobal expedition

abstract.para: The study here includes 40 samples (DNA) of the 18S (V9 region, DNA) from the Malaspina-2010 expedition. The samples were sequenced using Illumina MiSeq 2x250bp.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

samplingDescription.para: The study here includes 40 samples (DNA) of the 18S (V9 region, DNA) from the Malaspina-2010 expedition. The samples were sequenced using Illumina MiSeq 2x250bp.

project.title: Picoplankton 18S rRNA gene sequences (V9 region) from Vertical Profiles (surface to 4000m depth) sampled during the Malaspina 2010 circumglobal expedition
